local_intent: Re-align and execute the grape grasp using precomputed grasp_grape with a brief retry, then verify object capture and grasp stability.
assumptions: grasp_grape pose already computed and available
coherence_with_global: Matches the grasp phase of GLOBAL_BT: verifies visibility and pose, aligns with tolerance 0.01, performs Pick(grasp_grape,1200) with retry, then confirms object in gripper and stability.
